name: Doomsday II: Legions of Hell (3D FPS)
name_original: Doomsday II: Legions of Hell (3D FPS)
description:
Version 1.1 comming with 360 free downloadable maps (splited in 5 map packs). More downloadable content comming soon

Doomsday II: Legions of Hell new part of old school shooter, which based on community project Freedoom and source code of Doom Classic. Second part comes with 32 new challenging levels.

Doomsday features:
- New 32 levels
- Multiplayer over WiFi: cooperative and deathmatch
- 9 weapons: Fist, Pistol, Shotgun, Chaingun, Rocket Launcher, Plasma Gun, Circular saw, Super Shotgun, BFG
- Ability to add friendly dogs who will help fight monsters (go to Options -> Settings)
- Customizable controls
- 11 amazing soundtracks
- Special enemy: drunk sailor
- Powered by Doom™ engine (id Tech 1 engine)

iPad version also available: http://bit.ly/doomsday2hd
